alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 2:24AM EST until January 13 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, southerly winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, westerly winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Anne Arundel County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 5 AM EST Saturday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 7 AM to 4 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
